ygData.subject: Killer monk continues carnage.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Well the monk is now lvl 40(2yellows and 2 blue into it). Just had a Kaesora raid and it was awesome! Experience was great and loot fantastic! Got the VERY
ygData.messageBody:
Well the monk is now lvl 40(2yellows and 2 blue into it). Just had a
Kaesora raid and it was awesome! Experience was great and loot
fantastic! Got the VERY rare drop Shield of Spectral Essence
(3kpp) ,Rod of Battle(rare), 3 fangs for HS keys, Lotsa other great
loot. I got the Rod of Battle so now i have my 2hb weapon to train
with. If i thought that there was enough peeps reading/using this
board i'd share some serious secrets with you all, but it doesn't
seem to be used/looked at much.
